sub_title: Senior Talent Acquisition Business Partner @ dsm-firmenich EMEA
summary:
+31 623431261
martin.zwart@dsm.com 

Executive Recruiter, Senior Talent Acquisition Business Partner, and Career Coach with a focus on creative delivery of results under tight deadlines. Passionate I&D advocate.

Experienced in Executive Recruitment and Executive Search & Talent acquisition for (multi-) national companies, service providers, and startups. 

Dutch national, and full professional proficiency in English and German.

The purpose of ADI is to improve the areas of training, placement, and utilization of assistance dogs as well as staff and volunteer education. ADI has a comprehensive accredtation system and members have to be regularly assessed to ensure they meet the high standards expected of assistance dog programs.

Members of ADI meet regularly to share ideas and conduct business regarding such things as educating the public about assistance dogs, advocating for the legal rights of people with disabilities partnered with assistance dogs and the setting of standards and establishing guidelines and ethics for the training of these dogs.
